mapper.select: SELECT g.goodsId, g.goodsName, g.goodsPrice, s.shopName FROM goods g LEFT JOIN shop s ON g.shopId = s.shopId WHERE g.goodsName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchName}),'%')
SELECT g.goodsId, g.goodsName, g.goodsPrice, s.shopName FROM goods g LEFT JOIN shop s ON g.shopId = s.shopId WHERE g.typeId = 1 ORDER BY g.goodsUploadTime DESC
SELECT g.goodsId, g.goodsName, g.goodsPrice, s.shopName FROM goods g LEFT JOIN shop s ON g.shopId = s.shopId WHERE g.typeId = 0 ORDER BY g.goodsUploadTime DESC
SELECT g.goodsId, g.goodsName, g.goodsPrice, s.shopName FROM goods g LEFT JOIN shop s ON g.shopId = s.shopId WHERE g.typeId = 2 ORDER BY g.goodsUploadTime DESC
SELECT * FROM goods ORDER BY goodsPrice ASC
SELECT * FROM goods ORDER BY goodsUploadTime DESC

SELECT g.goodsName, g.goodsPrice, s.shopName, c.commentContent, c.commentTime, c.userId, u.userNickname FROM goods g LEFT JOIN shop s ON g.shopId = s.shopId LEFT JOIN comment c ON g.goodsId = c.goodsId LEFT JOIN userInfo u ON c.userId = u.userId WHERE g.goodsId = #{goodsId} ORDER BY c.commentTime DESC LIMIT 0,2
SELECT c.commentContent, c.commentTime, c.userId, u.userNickname FROM comment c LEFT JOIN userInfo u ON c.userId = u.userId WHERE c.goodsId = #{goodsId} ORDER BY c.commentTime DESC
